title: Willow Smith, 18, passionately kisses her boyfriend Tyler Cole after sushi date in Malibu
text:
Will Smith and Jada Pinkett's teenage daughter Willow passionately kissed her boyfriend Tyler Cole after dining on sushi at Nobu Malibu on Wednesday night.

The Time Machine singer - turning 19 on Halloween - matched her 21-year-old co-producer in a baggy hoodie, blue jeans, and sneakers for their hot dinner date.

The Calabasas socialite reportedly met the Family Reunion actor through her big brother Jaden, who hired Tyler to open for his Vision tour in 2018 after collaborating on MSFTSrep.

PDA alert! Will Smith and Jada Pinkett's teenage daughter Willow passionately kissed her boyfriend Tyler Cole after dining on sushi at Nobu Malibu on Wednesday night

Six months after their first couple sighting in April 2018, Cole publicly declared his love for his 'queen' and 'best friend.'

'I love you so much. Thank you for everything you have done for me,' the biracial aspiring filmmaker gushed on Instagram.

'You have touched my life in a way you will never understand. Thank you for helping me through some of the toughest times in my life and joining me in this crazy journey through space. You're the best ever.'

On Wednesday, Smith shared a promo of her busking with her guitar in London's Central Red Line tube for Prada's Linea Rossa (red line in Italian) FW/19 campaign.

Twinning! The Time Machine singer - turning 19 on Halloween - matched her 21-year-old co-producer in a baggy hoodie, blue jeans, and sneakers for their hot dinner date

Close with the Smiths: The Calabasas socialite reportedly met the Family Reunion actor through her big brother Jaden, who hired Tyler to open for his Vision tour in 2018 after collaborating on MSFTSrep

'I love you so much!' Six months after their first couple sighting in April 2018, Cole publicly declared his love for his 'queen' and 'best friend' (pictured September 19)

The Italian Vogue cover girl - who boasts 16.9M social media followers - wrote of the experience: 'I took London's underground by storm with a performance moment!'

The bisexual belter next performs her duet U Know with her 21-year-old brother on their 19-date Willow & Erys Tour, which kicks off at SOMA in San Diego on November 12.

Willow also co-hosts the weekly Facebook Watch series Red Table Talk alongside her mother Jada Pinkett Smith and grandmother Adrienne Banfield-Norris.

Surprise performance: On Wednesday, Smith shared a promo of her busking with her guitar in London's Central Red Line tube for Prada's Linea Rossa FW/19 campaign (pictured Monday)

The Italian Vogue cover girl - who boasts 16.9M social media followers - wrote of the experience: 'I took London's underground by storm with a performance moment!'
description: Will Smith and Jada Pinkett's daughter matched her 21-year-old co-producer in a baggy hoodie, blue jeans, and sneakers for their hot dinner date
